entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 40%
